changeSet.author: ntodorovic
changeSet.sql: create sequence campaign_seq; create table if not exists campaign ( id bigint not null constraint campaign_pkey primary key, url_friendly_name varchar(255), funding_goals bigint, market_image_url varchar(255), max_equity_offered numeric(19,2), min_equity_offered numeric(19,2), name varchar(255), time_to_raise_funds int check (time_to_raise_funds > 0), min_investment numeric(19,2), tag_line varchar(255), company_id bigint constraint campaign_fk_on_company references company, campaign_state_id bigint constraint campaign_fk_on_campaign_state references campaign_state );
